show.subtitle: “The Infectious Myth” will examine disease paradigms and the scientific or historical evidence that the simple story we are told about a virus, bacteria or gene causing a disease, is probably false.
show.title: The Infectious Myth

title: Jennifer Raff
content:
Jennifer Raff, a PhD anthropologist, published a blog on March 25th claiming that parents are being lied to about... <!--more--> vaccines.
Her opinion is that virtually all information claiming that vaccines are unsafe or ineffective is wrong, and that parents should just listen to respected scientific sources. Her blog post, entitled, “Parents you are being lied to”, quickly went viral, especially after it was picked up by the Huffington Post.
 This interview is a vivid reminder of the difficulty of having an open discussion on the issue of vaccines.
People are being lied to about vaccines, but which side is doing the majority of the lying?
